title: It’s Okay to Not Be Okay
description: Based on the work of acclaimed children’s author, Ko Mun-Yeong. A little girl struggles to find a sense of belonging as the monster within her pushes all those who might love her away.
quote: No one can ever stay by your side because you are a monster.
parent: It’s Okay to Not Be Okay
altHero: small girl sits on the balcony of a house against a starry sky
alt1: spooky crooked house and two black birds on some bendy tree branches
alt2: small girl whose long hair is a tree-like monster
alt3: girl and boy walk single file across a big log
alt4: girl picks flower petals with the boy behind her
